title: Bulk Upload Controls
description: Upload multiple controls from compliance framework

controls.name: AC-1: Access Control Policy and Procedures
controls.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates access control policies and procedures
controls.implementation_guidance: Develop and maintain documented access control policies that address purpose, scope, roles, responsibilities, management commitment, coordination, and compliance. Review and update the policy at least annually.

controls.name: AC-2: Account Management
controls.description: The organization manages information system accounts including establishing, activating, modifying, reviewing, disabling, and removing accounts
controls.implementation_guidance: Establish procedures for account management including account creation, modification, and termination. Maintain audit trail of all account activities.

controls.name: AU-1: Audit and Accountability Policy and Procedures
controls.description: The organization develops, documents, and disseminates audit and accountability policies and procedures
controls.implementation_guidance: Develop comprehensive audit policy covering what events to log, log retention periods, and log review procedures. Ensure logs are protected from unauthorized access.
